statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.UseYn Desc, AA.CategoryType, AA.SortOrder, AA.Name) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.CategoryType , AA.UseYn , AA.SortOrder , AA.Description , AA.InfoNoticeID , AA.ParentID
, M1.Name as CategoryTypeName , II.Name as InfoNoticeName , PP.Name as ParentName
FROM dbo.TCategoryItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CategoryType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'CategoryType' LEFT JOIN dbo.TCategoryItem PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ParentID = PP.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TInfoNotice II WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.InfoNoticeID = II.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
AND AA.CategoryType = #CategoryType#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TCategoryItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TCategoryItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.Name = #Name#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCategoryItem ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, CategoryType, UseYn, SortOrder, Description, InfoNoticeID, ParentID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #CategoryType#, #UseYn#, #SortOrder#, #Description#, #InfoNoticeID#, #ParentID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCategoryItem SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , CategoryType = #CategoryType# , UseYn = #UseYn# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# , Description = #Description# , InfoNoticeID = #InfoNoticeID# , ParentID = #ParentID# WHERE ID = #ID#
